BackstoryDef.title: Baby Android
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a newly fabricated, pill-shaped chassis without limbs. [PAWN_pronoun] is entirely dependent on android caretakers for guidance while [PAWN_possessive] core initializes.

BackstoryDef.title: Android Child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has developed a unique personality kernel. Eager to learn, [PAWN_pronoun] mimics human behaviors and colony life with clumsy enthusiasm.

BackstoryDef.title: Colony-born Android
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] finished [PAWN_possessive] artificial growth cycle within this colony. [PAWN_possessive] fully compiled consciousness is a permanent reflection of the environment that raised [PAWN_objective].
